item.description:
We play at 8pm on the football field at Russell Field by Alewife Station. We generally play til 10ish and then figure out fun apres-fris festivities. Before attending our events, please review our About Us page.



Please bring a light-colored shirt for visibility's sake, water and a smiling face. We'll provide cones, frisbees, glowsticks and fun new friends.

Our Organizers pay out of pocket for the equipment. If you wish to donate, consider bringing a couple bucks or visit our Amazon Wishlist

Click here to see a full Google map of the area. As imaged above, there is a parking lot at the field. If you Red Line to Alewife, look for signs upon exiting that will direct you to Russell Field.

If you have any questions about, don't hesitate to contact the Organizers!

Thanks, and see you on the field!
-Jim 'n' Amy
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the astroturf field, throwing LED discs or warming up near the bleachers.
item.why: Because you're a fun, exciting person, and we're a fun-loving, exhilarating community of frisbee players!
item.name: We've Got the 4-11 for Ultimate
